metadata.dc:author: Andresen, M
Méndez, A
Lira, P
Costa, M
Zúñiga, C
Rosenberg, H
metadata.dc:description: We report a patient who developed acute renal failure at the first severe hemolytic crisis associated to paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria. The associated histologic findings on electron microscopy and immunofluorescence are discussed as an insight to possible pathogenic mechanisms.
metadata.dc:title: Hemoglobinuria paroxística nocturna: insuficiencia renal aguda como forma de presentación.
[Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria presenting as acute renal failure].
